activities: Personal information regarding customers provided by customers exclusively at their own initiative, and exclusively for their own use. Personal information regarding individuals employed by resellers is collected exclusively for the purpose of ensuring the timely delivery of official correspondence. All users have direct and unrestricted access to their own personal information. This information can be updated or deleted by the owner of the personal data at any time.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
